# Unicode.GeneralCategory.lowercaseLetter

**Case**

A lowercase letter.

## Declaration

```swift
case lowercaseLetter
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Lowercase_Letter` (abbreviated `Ll`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.lowercaseLetter
